page.title: 17Warcop C.E. Primary School
page.content: Our school is a small school with 42 children aged between 4 and 11 years. It has two full time teachers, Miss Thorp and Mr Barraclough, the head. Mrs Harris comes in for one morning a week, and Mrs Clifford also comes in one morning each week to work with a few children. A lot of mums come to school to help us with our work as well. It is an old school - no-one is sure when it was built - with a new part where the infants work. Some children come to school in a land-rover, but most walk. We do all kinds of work - Maths, English, Science, Music, Topic, P.E., Games, R.E. and Art and Craft, but the best part is when we go on a field study trip for a week. This year we went to Sheffield.
